item.title: ArchLinux + SwayWM
item.description: I told you I’ve been in a love with tiling window managers for a while since I’m a keyboard person. For me, if there is a shortcut to do something then use it, otherwise assign a shortcut. So tiling window managers are my thing but I must say it’s not feasible for a starter. If you don’t have that much experience on Linux OS probably you will get nuts if something goes wrong, and believe me probably something will go wrong.
